full_reset() → None[source]

Completely reset the session streak state.

This method resets the player name, win count, and points total to their initial values.

player_name: str | None = None
points_total: int = 0
reset_streak_counters() → None[source]

Reset the streak counters for the current session.

This method sets both the win count and points total to zero, but retains the current player name for the session.

worderly.main() → None[source]

Run the Worderly game.

This function initializes the game, handles mode selection, and starts the main game session. It also resets the session streak state at the start.
